fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Culture and media, Budget, Competition, Culture, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Youth, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Food Safety, Digital economy and society, Sport, Transport, Climate Action, Communication
eu_initiatives: We mostly focus on Horizon 2020 and other community programmes, ESIF funds, EIB administered and other financial instruments. Institute does not limit itself to any sector and it provides assistance to innovative startups and SMEs via different dedicated instruments.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
relevant_communication: We organize events to inform key stakeholders about H2020 work programmes.  The upcoming event for 2017 is a conference on 2018-2020 work programme parts.
goals__remit: Institute for European Cooperation facilitates cooperation among municipalities, business entities and other organizations operating within the Czech Republic and their partner organizations in countries of the European Union. The IEC promotes collaboration by creating and participating on dissemination of the best standards and practices in various areas of human activity, as well as providing assistance in creation and proliferation of innovations and the most up to date knowledge, all the while supporting the forming of high quality collaborative networks among interested parties.
